resources.string: Paste link here from TikTok to download it
*It\'s recommended to update the tool periodically from settings screen (three dots in the top bar)

1. Go to the Home Screen from the bottom navigation bar. 
2. Press the Paste button to insert a copied TikTok link. 
3. Press the Download button to fetch details about the TikTok. 
4. Select your preferred download option (check the card below for more details). 
5. If you haven’t chosen a download folder yet, the app will prompt you to select one in Settings. 
6. Once the download is complete, you can view your TikTok in the Downloads Screen.


Notes: 
- If you encounter an error while downloading, try updating the yt-dlp tool from Settings (three dots on the top bar) and then retry. 
- For persistent errors, try selecting a different download option. 
- Pressing the Delete button will reset the text field and remove any pasted links or download options.

1. Download Video (Worst) -> Downloads the video in the lowest quality available (may include a watermark). \n2. Download Video (Best) -> Downloads the video in the highest quality available (usually without a watermark). \n3. Download Audio (MP3) -> Downloads the audio in the best quality (converts the video to MP3 after download).

- Tap on a downloaded TikTok to open it in your Gallery app or choose a suitable app to view it. \n- Long press a TikTok to bring up sharing options. \n- Tap the three dots to open a menu with options to open, share, or delete the TikTok.

1. Dark Theme -> Enables dark mode across the app. 
2. Rate This App -> Opens the app’s page on the Google Play Store for rating. 
3. Share This App -> Allows you to share the app’s Google Play Store link. 
4. Privacy Policy -> Displays the app’s privacy policy. 
5. App Version -> Shows the current version of the app. 
6. Download Location -> Lets you view or change the folder for storing downloads. 
7. Update Channel -> Selects the channel for yt-dlp updates (leave as default if unsure). 
8. Update yt-dlp -> Updates the yt-dlp tool to the latest version.

- This app only supports TikTok video/audio downloads. It does not work with other social networks. 
- The app relies on yt-dlp and youtubedl-android tools. Any changes to these tools may affect app functionality. 
- Storage permissions are required to save and manage downloaded files. Please grant these permissions for the app to work correctly. 
- Notification permissions are required for some Android versions. Please grant these for full functionality.

This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is handled when using the TikTok Downloader CI Application. 

Information We Collect: 
The app does not collect personal data. Storage Permissions are only requested to save downloaded files. 

Downloaded Files: 
Files are stored in your device’s external storage. Storage permissions are necessary to save files properly. 

Usage of Downloaded Files and Sharing Features: 
The app does not access or store any personal information related to the content of the downloaded files. 
The app does not have access to or control over the content shared through any external application. 

Changes to This Policy: 
We may update this policy occasionally. Check this page for updates. Changes are effective immediately upon posting. 

By using the TikTok Downloader CI Application, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.
